reasoning: Trade Empire is BLOCKED (P1 holds COURT_012 at 2/2). Pivoting to massive Docks expansion leveraging 3 Maritime agents. All 3 abilities generate FREE value: +6 gold + 4 influence in Docks. Gold flows to those who pivot quickly when markets shift.
